rows.label: qst202914_0010
rows.name:
Why'd you go to a dangerous place like
that all on your own?

rows.label: qst202914_0020
rows.name:
Didn't you want to grow up and be all pretty?
You can't do that if you get yourself killed!

rows.label: qst202914_0030
rows.name: I'm sorry...

rows.label: qst202914_0040
rows.name: I just really wanted to find one of these...

rows.label: qst202914_0050
rows.name: Why...those are Moondrops!

rows.label: qst202914_0060
rows.name:
Uh-huh. They're the flowers you
said you liked.

rows.label: qst202914_0070
rows.name: I only managed to get two of them...

rows.label: qst202914_0080
rows.name:
But I wanted to give them to you,
as a super special present!

rows.label: qst202914_0090
rows.name: ...For me?

rows.label: qst202914_0100
rows.name: Yep!

rows.label: qst202914_0110
rows.name:
You taught me all sorts of things,
remember?

rows.label: qst202914_0120
rows.name: So I wanted to do something lovely for you, too!

rows.label: qst202914_0130
rows.name:
You braved a scary place like that,
and put yourself in danger, all for me?

rows.label: qst202914_0140
rows.name: You really are a silly girl.

rows.label: qst202914_0150
rows.name: But you did show me a beautiful sight.

rows.label: qst202914_0160
rows.name: You like them?!

rows.label: qst202914_0170
rows.name: I never saw something so pretty.

rows.label: qst202914_0180
rows.name:
Even Moondrops aren't as beautiful
as what I'm lookin' at right now.

rows.label: qst202914_0190
rows.name: More pretty than Moondrops?

rows.label: qst202914_0200
rows.name:
Uh-huh. I'm talking about your
sweet little heart, hon.

rows.label: qst202914_0210
rows.name:
It may not be easy to see,
and you can't put a price on it...

rows.label: qst202914_0220
rows.name:
But that pure and tender heart o' yours
is more beautiful than anything in this world.

rows.label: qst202914_0230
rows.name: My...heart?

rows.label: qst202914_0240
rows.name: I guess you're a little young to understand, huh.

rows.label: qst202914_0250
rows.name: But one day you'll see what I mean.

rows.label: qst202914_0260
rows.name:
Oh, yeah - I gotta give you
somethin' in return, too.

rows.label: qst202914_0270
rows.name: Feast your eyes on this!

rows.label: qst202914_0280
rows.name:
Wowwwww!
That's amazing!

rows.label: qst202914_0290
rows.name: There you go. D'you like it?

rows.label: qst202914_0300
rows.name:
I love it!
Thanks a million, Tsuki!

rows.label: qst202914_0310
rows.name: No, thank you, sweetie.

rows.label: qst202914_0320
rows.name: Hey, listen!

rows.label: qst202914_0330
rows.name:
I'm gonna become the prettiest,
coolest Driver ever!

rows.label: qst202914_0340
rows.name:
And then I'm gonna find you again,
and make you my very own Blade!

rows.label: qst202914_0350
rows.name: You want to be my Driver?

rows.label: qst202914_0360
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: qst202914_0370
rows.name: Hahaha... Well, I think that's great!

rows.label: qst202914_0380
rows.name:
Though I want you to know, my Driver
right now's tough as an old boot.

rows.label: qst202914_0390
rows.name: You might be waitin' quite a while!
